sentences.en: As Jane Finch drove to work she thought about her Sandy.
sentences.cn: 去上班的路上,简·芬奇一面开着车,一面想着她的桑迪.

sentences.en: By this behavior the finch opened up a new niche to itself.
sentences.cn: 通过这个行为,小鸟为自己开发了新的得利模式.

sentences.en: Connie: Have you heard from Sam Finch?
sentences.cn: 康妮: 有山姆•芬奇的消息 吗 ?

sentences.en: Finch had regular flying, and closed to chirp to a person.
sentences.cn: 有鸟雀常飞来飞去, 叽叽喳喳着于人亲近.

sentences.en: Lo do a te finch ｅ vivr ｏ e a nessun altro lo dar ｏ.
sentences.cn: 我唱催眠曲,这个爱我该给谁.

sentences.en: North American finch having a raspberry - red head and breast and rump.
sentences.cn: 头、胸和尾为紫红色的北美洲小雀鸟.

sentences.en: North American finch of marshy area.
sentences.cn: 生活在北美洲沼泽地区.

sentences.en: One species of finch learned to pick up a cactus needle to poke for insects.
sentences.cn: 有一种雀科小鸟学会捡起仙人掌针去戳得昆虫猎物。

sentences.en: She lists Abercrombie and Finch among her favorite luxury brands.
sentences.cn: 最奢侈的牌子:衣服鞋子木有奢侈品,香水有一堆,不分国籍地.

sentences.en: South American species of scarlet finch with black head and wings and tail.
sentences.cn: 南美洲鲜红色色雀鸟,头、翅膀和尾巴都是黑色的.

sentences.en: The chicks began growing wider, taller, more robust beaks similar to those of a nut - cracking finch.
sentences.cn: 结果小鸡的喙开始长得又宽 、 又高 、 又结实,很像一种破坚果的雀喙.

sentences.en: The movie studio wanted Rock Hudson to Atticus Finch.
sentences.cn: 制片厂打算让罗克·赫德森饰演阿提库斯·芬奇.

sentences.en: The scientists tried playing the same sound sample again with another group, and they got pissed, too -- virtually every finch that heard it, in fact.
sentences.cn: 而科学家们对另外一群孟加拉雀们播放同样的叫声，他们同样也很生气。 事实上每一只鸟都是如此。

sentences.en: This behaviour is commonly observed among several species of finch.
sentences.cn: 这种行为常常可以在几种雀科鸣禽中看到.

sentences.en: We saw a finch light on ( or upon ) a bough.
sentences.cn: 我们看到树枝上停著或一只麻雀.

sentences.en: We wake every morning to the sound of a finch singing.
sentences.cn: 每天早晨醒来时还能听到燕雀的歌唱。

sentences.en: What colour is a purple finch?

trans.tran_cn: （常构成复合词）雀科小鸟，雀类
trans.tran_en: a small bird with a short beak
